hoverable.description: Allow hover effect for card and change cursor to pointer.

divider.description: Divider between header, default and footer slots.

default.description: The default slot is the main area for primary content, like descriptions, images, or interactive elements.

header.description: Ideal for titles or introductory information, such as headings, icons, or brief summaries that give context to the card.

footer.description: For actions or supporting details, like buttons, links, or metadata that complement the main content.
